name: Tummy Lasers
description:
Earth's kittens are being kidnapped by an unstoppable alien invasion fleet! Only you, with your mastery of the tummy laser can save them!

Tummy Lasers is a twist on the classic arcade shooters of the 80's. The protagonist (a fluorescent-yellow feline with a weaponized tummy) is controlled by rotating left and right, with the recoil of your bullets pushing you in the opposite direction. Holding down the fire button produces a steady laser beam that allows you to hover and glide across the level.

This unusual control scheme is fun and challenging, but with a little practice is surprisingly elegant and affords a high degree of fine control. You can swoop between enemies, narrowly maneuvering past a missile before shooting your target out of the air. By combining the regular shot with the laser, you can even string together kills to build up your multiplier!

  • More than 15 action-packed waves set over 4 distinct worlds
  • 10+ Alien monsters to battle against
  • 4 giant bosses
  • Novel control scheme
  • Save kittens to unlock new playable characters
  • Keyboard & Xinput controller support
